title: Next.js - E-Commerce
description: This project showcases an E-commerce platform developed with Next.js, utilizing Tailwind CSS, Lazy Loading, and integration with the FreedomPay API. Reviews and items are efficiently stored in Firebase's Firestore database. Email notifications are implemented using sendinblue service. You can read more about this project and its use case on github page.

title: Dynamic Contentful Blog with full i18n Internationalization Integration
description: A dynamic Next.js blog powered by Contentful, seamlessly integrated with i18n for full internationalization. This project features a multilingual interface that not only translates the website but also intelligently fetches and displays blog posts in the chosen language. Leverage the power of Contentful for efficient content management, and provide a localized, user-friendly experience with i18n.
brief: This project uses Contentful for Blog, and i18n to switch between languages and conditionally load relative blog post's fields, so that blog feed is translated as well.

title: Website for a paper manufacturer
description: I had the privilege of working on a website project for a distinguished paper manufacturer. Through thoughtful design and user-focused development, I contributed to creating an online presence that reflects the essence of their craft. The goal was to showcase their quality products and commitment to sustainability. It was a rewarding experience to bring their story to life in the digital space, emphasizing simplicity and functionality to enhance the user experience. Explore the project to witness the seamless blend of aesthetics and purpose in the world of paper manufacturing.
brief: I had the privilege of working on a website project for a paper manufacturer

title: Altaysorbent.org
description: As part of a collaborative effort, I contributed to the development of Altaysorbent.org, a dynamic website built using Next.js. This project aimed to provide a comprehensive online platform for Altaysorbent, a pharmaceutical company specializing in a unique health supplement. The website was designed to cater to a broad international audience, including customers in CIS and European countries. The inclusion of real-time shipping quotes based on destination ensures a user-friendly experience. Payment processing through the PayBox API ensured the safety of users' financial information. Utilizing Contentful as a headless CMS, the project team could manage product information, articles, and other content efficiently. The website was optimized for mobile devices, ensuring a seamless experience across different screen sizes.
